description: . A list of timestamped readings (values) for a data channel (AboutName, CapturedByName, TelemetryName).

DataChannel.description: The Data Channel that this batch of timestamped values is about.

ScadaReadTimeUnixMsList.title: List of Read Times
ScadaReadTimeUnixMsList.description: The times that the MultipurposeSensor took the readings, in unix milliseconds

Axiom1.title: ListLengthConsistency
Axiom1.description: ValueList and ReadTimeUnixMsList must have the same length.

ReasonableUnixTimeMs.description: An integer reflecting unix time in MILLISECONDS between midnight Jan 1 2000 and midnight Jan 1 3000 UTC
